description:
Investments (enterprises with a turnover from EUR 250 000)

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
47415 Structural survey of service activities

Definition:
Gross fixed capital formation consists of the gross
additions of fixed tangible and intangible assets during the
reference year, provided they
- have been capitalised or included in the register
of fixed assets and
- are intended for permanent use in the survey unit
(with a useful life of at least one year).
This includes leased goods to be capitalised by the lessee.
